title: Adjust intro/splash overlay total duration to ~2 seconds

requirements.summary: Increase the intro/splash overlay lifetime so it completes and dismisses at ~2000ms without altering any other behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: When the intro/splash overlay is shown, it takes approximately 2000ms from mount until it calls onComplete and is removed.
The fade/transition timing is consistent with the 2-second duration (no premature completion).
No other UI flows, authentication behavior, navigation, or data functionality changes.

file_operations.description: Adjust the IntroScreen timers so the overlay remains visible for ~2000ms total before calling onComplete; keep the existing fade animation behavior aligned with the new total duration (e.g., introduce a delay before starting the existing fade-out, and move onComplete to fire at ~2000ms). Do not change any other visuals, content, interaction behavior, or app logic.
